description: Open-source hardware metrics collection tool for Windows/Linux/macOS
goals: Collect comprehensive hardware metrics (CPU, GPU, RAM, disk, network)
Privacy-focused design with cryptographic hardware IDs
Automatic session classification based on workload patterns
Efficient CSV logging with rolling daily files
Optional encrypted cloud sync to Google Drive

adapters: NvidiaGPUAdapter - NVIDIA GPU metrics via pynvml
core_modules: utils.py - Hardware detection, crypto ID, session classification, cloud upload

privacy_guarantees: No process names or window titles collected
No user names or personal data
No network addresses or file paths
